Paul<S>3972</S>, and<S>2532</S> Silvanus<S>4610</S>, and<S>2532</S> Timotheus<S>5095</S>, unto the church<S>1577</S> of the Thessalonians<S>2331</S> which is in<S>1722</S> God<S>2316</S> the Father<S>3962</S> and<S>2532</S> in the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: Grace<S>5485</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
We give thanks<S>2168</S> to God<S>2316</S> always<S>3842</S> for<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>, making<S>4160</S> mention<S>3417</S> of you<S>5216</S> in<S>1909</S> our<S>2257</S> prayers<S>4335</S>;
Remembering<S>3421</S> without ceasing<S>89</S> your<S>5216</S> work<S>2041</S> of faith<S>4102</S>, and<S>2532</S> labour<S>2873</S> of love<S>26</S>, and<S>2532</S> patience<S>5281</S> of hope<S>1680</S> in our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, in the sight<S>1715</S> of God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S>;
Knowing<S>1492</S>, brethren<S>80</S> beloved<S>25</S>, your<S>5216</S> election<S>1589</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>. <sup>beloved: or, beloved of God, your election</sup>
For<S>3754</S> our<S>2257</S> gospel<S>2098</S> came<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> unto<S>1519</S> you<S>5209</S> in<S>1722</S> word<S>3056</S> only<S>3440</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> power<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> much<S>4183</S> assurance<S>4136</S>; as<S>2531</S> ye know<S>1492</S> what manner of men<S>3634</S> we were<S>1096</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> for<S>1223</S> your<S>5209</S> sake.
And<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> became<S>1096</S> followers<S>3402</S> of us<S>2257</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, having received<S>1209</S> the word<S>3056</S> in<S>1722</S> much<S>4183</S> affliction<S>2347</S>, with<S>3326</S> joy<S>5479</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>:
So<S>5620</S> that ye<S>5209</S> were<S>1096</S> ensamples<S>5179</S> to all<S>3956</S> that believe<S>4100</S> in<S>1722</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S> and<S>2532</S> Achaia<S>882</S>.
For<S>1063</S> from<S>575</S> you<S>5216</S> sounded out<S>1837</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> in<S>1722</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S> and<S>2532</S> Achaia<S>882</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> place<S>5117</S> your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> to<S>4314</S> God-ward<S>2316</S> is spread abroad<S>1831</S>; so<S>5620</S> that we<S>2248</S> need<S>5532</S> not<S>3361</S> <S>2192</S> to speak<S>2980</S> any thing<S>5100</S>.
For<S>1063</S> they<S>518</S> themselves<S>846</S> shew<S>518</S> of<S>4012</S> us<S>2257</S> what manner<S>3697</S> of entering in<S>1529</S> we had<S>2192</S> <S>2192</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> how<S>4459</S> ye turned<S>1994</S> to<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S> from<S>575</S> idols<S>1497</S> to serve<S>1398</S> the living<S>2198</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>228</S> God<S>2316</S>;
And<S>2532</S> to wait for<S>362</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, whom<S>3739</S> he raised<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, even Jesus<S>2424</S>, which<S>3588</S> delivered<S>4506</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>575</S> the wrath<S>3709</S> to come<S>2064</S>.
